item.description:
On December 14, 2012, 26 angels were taken from their families, friends, and loved ones. Our goal in the Sandy Hook Family Fund 5K is to raise $50,000. 100% of the proceeds made will go to My Sandy Hook Family Fund, which is a fund created by CT parents and friends dedicated to providing immediate and continuing support for the 26 families of those who lost children and loved ones in the Sandy Hook School tragedy. Please help us in the support of these families!

Registration is only $10 at http://www.active.com/running/milford-ct/sandy-hook-family-fund-5k-2013.  I just started training using the Couch to 10k program but I can tell you, I am nowhere near being ready to run a 5k right now.  But this is a run/walk.  So if you are nervous or new to running, not to worry.   

I am not familiar with this location so I can't really say where to meet.  My cell phone number is 860-759-6949.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo but now have bangs
item.name: Sandy Hook Family Fund 5k Run/Walk
